item.title: Sombody help me please
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

Well i try to make a Help command …

[code] public void ServerHelpMenu() {

    sendQuest("@dre@Server Information Menu", 8144); // Title
    clearQuestInterface();
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server Information", 8145);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server IP: @gre@" + "fatalnation.no-ip.biz", 8147);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Players Online: @gre@" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(),
            8148);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server Hoster And Creator: @dre@" + "admin", 8149);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server Admins: @dbl@" + " admin, Oledis, ....", 8150);
    sendQuest(" ", 8151);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@" + " ---", 8152);
    sendQuest("@dbl@WebSite: @red@" + "www.fatalnation.no-ip.biz", 8153);
    sendQuestSomething(8143);
    showInterface(8134);
    flushOutStream();
	
}[/code]

Well i save the client.java i compile , run , and the problem is … how i make a command for that ? like ::help

Read full topic
